      • follow

        public void follow(com.badlogic.ashley.core.Entity entity,
          java.lang.Float minX,
          java.lang.Float maxX,
          java.lang.Float minY,
          java.lang.Float maxY)
        Sets the camera to follow this entity while keeping within the bounds set
        Parameters:
        entity - Entity for the camera to follow
        minX - minimum X position of the left edge of the camera, null for unlimited
        maxX - maximum X position of the right edge of the camera, null for unlimited
        minY - minimum Y position of the bottom edge of the camera, null for unlimited
        maxY - maximum Y position of the top edge of the camera, null for unlimited
